mapper.sql: b_id, business_no, order_info, status, toyal_price, pay_type, member_id, create_time, member_name, product_name, amount, tel, product_id, evaluate
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from business_order
order by ${orderByClause}

select distinct(bo.b_id) ,bo.* FROM product p INNER JOIN business_order bo ON bo.product_id=p.id
NAME like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into business_order (b_id, business_no, order_info, status, toyal_price, pay_type, member_id, create_time, member_name, product_name, amount, tel, product_id, evaluate) values (#{bId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toyalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update business_order
b_id = #{record.bId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
business_no = #{record.businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_info = #{record.orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
toyal_price = #{record.toyalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_type = #{record.payType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
member_name = #{record.memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_name = #{record.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{record.amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{record.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
evaluate = #{record.evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update business_order set b_id = #{record.bId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_no = #{record.businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_info = #{record.orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, toyal_price = #{record.toyalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_type = #{record.payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_id = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, member_name = #{record.memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{record.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{record.amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{record.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evaluate = #{record.evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update business_order
business_no = #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_info = #{orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
toyal_price = #{toyalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
evaluate = #{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where b_id = #{bId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
